info.title: FlavorDB API Endpoint Playground
info.description: API for accessing molecule and flavor information

get.description: Get Flavor Compound by Taste Thresholds

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Select one or more taste threshold values.

get.description: Get Flavor Compound by Synthesis Methods

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Select one or more synthesis keywords.

get.description: Get Trade Association Guidelines

parameters.name: guideline
parameters.description: Select one or more trade association guideline values.

get.description: Get Natural Occurrence Information for a Flavor Compound

parameters.name: occurrence
x-enum-values: Reported found as a constituent in coffee
Reported found in raw and roasted peanut
Reported found in purple passion fruit
parameters.description: Select one or more natural occurrences.

get.description: Get Flavor Compound by National Academy of Sciences Number
Get Flavor Compound by JECFA Number
Get IOFI Categorization for a Flavor Compound

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Select one or more IOFI categories.

get.description: Get Flavor Compound by FLAVIS Number
Get Flavor Compound by FEMA Number
Get Flavor Compound by EINECS Number

parameters.name: einecs_no
parameters.description: Select one or more EINECS numbers or related keywords.

get.description: Get Molecule Description for a Flavor Compound

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Select one or more description keywords.

get.description: Get Flavor Compound by Council of Europe Number
Get Council of Europe Approval Status for a Flavor Compound

parameters.name: coe_approval
parameters.description: Select one or more CoE approval keywords.

get.description: Get Aroma Threshold Values for a Flavor Compound

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Select one or more aroma threshold values.

parameters.name: common_name

parameters.name: food_pair
parameters.description: Select ingredient to get top 10 ingredients that share the most molecules.

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description:
To access the API, provide a valid JWT token in the 'Authorization' header. The 'Bearer' prefix is automatically added, so you only need to enter the token itself. The token is generated by the API.

Example value: <API_KEY>
